meanings.definition: The practice of volunteering for a charity or organization while traveling.
meanings.sent1: Many students participate in voluntourism during their school breaks to help others.
meanings.sent2: Voluntourism has become popular among travelers who want to give back to communities.
meanings.sent3: The voluntourism group accidentally ended up in a cooking class instead of a construction site.
meanings.sent4: Her voluntourism experience opened her eyes to the different ways people live around the world.
meanings.sent5: The voluntourism trip left a lasting impact on the local community.

meanings.definition: A combination of volunteering and tourism, typically involving short-term projects in developing countries.
meanings.sent1: The voluntourism program allowed participants to build houses and explore the local culture.
meanings.sent2: Voluntourism offers a unique opportunity to contribute to a community while experiencing a new place.
meanings.sent3: During their voluntourism trip, they accidentally joined a dance class instead of a beach cleanup.
meanings.sent4: The voluntourism project painted a picture of hope and collaboration in the village.
meanings.sent5: She described her voluntourism adventure as a blend of giving back and adventure.
